##  What is your refactoring proposal?

Provide a clear and concise description of what should be refactored.

Describe:
- What part of the code is affected
- What problems exist in the current implementation
- What improvement is expected

---

##  Objectives

What are the goals of this refactor?

- [ ] Improve readability
- [ ] Reduce code duplication
- [ ] Improve performance
- [ ] Improve maintainability
- [ ] Apply design patterns
- [ ] Improve separation of concerns
- [ ] Other: ___________

##  Current Implementation

Describe the current structure and its issues.

Example:
- Logic is tightly coupled
- Large functions with multiple responsibilities
- Repeated code blocks
- Difficult to test
